H0.text: Which planet did Gustav Holst describe as the ‘Winged Messenger’. Venus

H1.text: Which planet did Gustav Holst describe as the ‘Winged Messenger’. Mars

H2.text: Which planet did Gustav Holst describe as the ‘Winged Messenger’. Jupiter

H3.text: Which planet did Gustav Holst describe as the ‘Winged Messenger’. Mercury

A4.text: Mercury is dominated by uneven metres and rapid changes of theme, to represent the speedy flight of the winged messenger.

A5.text: In 'Mars', a persistent, uneven rhythmic cell consisting of five beats, combined with trumpet calls and harmonic dissonance provides battle music which Short asserts is unique in its expression of violence and sheer terror.
